6 class CertificationException : public LibCryptoSecException
7 {
8 public:
9  enum ErrorCode
10  {
11  UNKNOWN,
12  INVALID_CERTIFICATE,
13  INVALID_CRL,

22  };
23  CertificationException(std::string where)
24  {

26  this->errorCode = CertificationException::UNKNOWN;
27  }

31  this->errorCode = errorCode;
32  }
33  virtual ~CertificationException() throw () {}
34  virtual std::string getMessage() const
35  {
36  return (CertificationException::errorCode2Message(this->errorCode));
37  }
38  virtual std::string toString() const
39  {
40  std::string ret;
41  if (this->errorCode == CertificationException::UNKNOWN)
42  {
43  ret = "CertificationException. Called by: " + this->where + ".";
44  }
45  else
46  {
47  ret = "CertificationException: " + CertificationException::errorCode2Message(this->errorCode) + ". Called by: " + this->where + ".";
48  }
49  return ret;
50  }
51  virtual CertificationException::ErrorCode getErrorCode()
52  {
53  return this->errorCode;
54  }
55  static std::string errorCode2Message(CertificationException::ErrorCode errorCode)
56  {
57  std::string ret;
58  switch (errorCode)
59  {
60  case CertificationException::UNKNOWN:
61  ret = "Unknown error";
62  break;
63  case CertificationException::INVALID_CERTIFICATE:
64  ret = "Invalid certificate object";
65  break;
66  case CertificationException::INVALID_CRL:
67  ret = "Invalid CRL object";
68  break;
69  case CertificationException::INVALID_EXTENSION:
70  ret = "Invalid extension";
71  break;
72  case CertificationException::SET_NO_VALUE:
73  ret = "Set no value";
74  break;
75  case CertificationException::INTERNAL_ERROR:
76  ret = "Internal error";
77  break;
78  case CertificationException::UNSUPPORTED_ASYMMETRIC_KEY_TYPE:
79  ret = "Unsupported asymmetric key type";
80  break;
81  case CertificationException::INVALID_TYPE:
82  ret = "Invalid type";
83  break;
84  case CertificationException::ADDING_EXTENSION:
85  ret = "Adding extension";
86  break;
87  case CertificationException::UNKNOWN_OID:
88  ret = "Unknown OID";
89  break;
90  case CertificationException::KNOWN_OID:
91  ret = "Known OID";
92  break;
93 // case CertificationException:::

95 // break;
